basic.Target Organism: [Ref.19807165]Fungi:Botrytis cinerea (EC50=20 µM), Candida albicans (EC50=20 µM), Colletotrichum coccodes (EC50=10 µM), Fusarium oxysporum (EC50=10 µM), Fusarium solani (EC50=10 µM), Trichoderma harzianum (EC50=20 µM), Trichoderma viride (EC50=20 µM), Aspergillus fumigatus EC50=40 µM), Aspergillus parasiticus (EC50=80 µM), Didymella bryoniae (EC50=40 µM).
